item.description:
**This event will be hosted by Christina, our new Assistant Organizer! Show your love and support as she hosts her first event at the MFA, this Friday!**

Join us this Friday evening for a spirited evening of socializing. Enjoy music, cocktails, friends new and old, and fine art. There is no other way to start the month!

Meetup time: 7pm to 9pm.

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Museum Members: entry is FREE.
Non-Museum members: entry is FREE with Museum admission.

*Meeting details - This place gets crowded as the night progresses, so try to get there early. The Koch Gallery is on the 2nd floor, and we will meet inside this large gallery.

If you plan on coming after 8pm, or if you need help finding the group, please call Christina at 617-640-3815. You can find Christina's picture on the left side of the homepage under her name in the Asst Organizers section.

For more information, see http://www.mfa.org/ca...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Back to the MFA - First Friday this Week, Nov 2nd!
